author: Cassandra
text: The backpack had a lot more flaws than what was described. Also the pictures that were posted of the backpack didn’t include the loose threads, spots on the nylon and the wear on the leather. Very disappointed.
title: More Flaws Than Described

author: Cheryl
text: This was my first purchase from this site. I bought a jacket that was posted as a size large , but it fit more like  a small- medium. I could barely get my arms in the in it. Plus the quality wasn’t what I expected considering the price.
title: This was my first purchase

author: Sharon
text:
Quality is not great

First time purchaser - thought the quality would be better for the price I'm paying, but there were more scratches than I expected and dirtier than expected. I have to get one of the purses professionally cleaned. Unfortunately cannot return the items either. Overall, won't be inclined to purchase from the RealReal again.
title: Quality is not great

author: Customer
text: I like the idea behind and have been their customer for a few years already. Though, based on my last order (February 2022), a few items were overprized given their conditions. For example, I paid almost $50 for wool pants which had a tear and were repaired and it was not even mentioned in the description. I returned the item, but was not expected to get pants with mended holes. The return policy is good, -$12 for shipping back though.
title: I hope the pricing will get better

author: Lee
text: The Rolex I ordered did not arrive as described or pictured in the listing. First, the watch was listed as in working condition, however when I received the watch the crown was broken and I have been unable to properly set the time or close and screw down the crown. Second, the listing stated the watch bracelet would fit a 7.5" wrist and the pictures showed the bracelet coming with 13 links. The watch arrived with only 10 links and barely able to fit a 6" wrist. Overall I am not happy with this purchase.
title: Product arrived not as described or pictured in listing

author: R.Alba
text:
There was an incongruence between the item description and the actual status of the items. The items are not returnable, I tried to make a claim but they told me that I needed to return the items so they can make the refund. 

All of this after the first agent told me that will proceed with the refund. 

Very unhappy with this purchase and customer service.
title: Very bad customer service.
